title: Rohan
description: The Kingdom of Rohan is mighty indeed. Home of the Horse Lords and a great kingdom of men, Rohan lies between the White Mountains and the Misty Mountains. It is ruled by King Theoden and is also known as the Riddermark.

services.title: Equestrian Services
services.intro: As one might expect from the Kingdom of the Horse Lords, Rohan is well know for its excellent stock. Appeal to King Theoden and you might be given the chance to be born on the backs of one of these might animals.

services.title: Performances
services.intro: Drama certainly has its place in Rohan. Come join the people of the Riddermark for some dramatic sequences performed live right before your eyes.
lists: I Told You to Take the Wizard's Staff- the Play
What News From the Riddermark - Synchronized Riding

services.title: Battles
services.intro: In time of war, every able man was obliged to join the Muster of Rohan. Rohan was bound by the Oath of Ã‰orl to help Gondor in times of peril, and the latter asked for their aid through the giving of the Red Arrow. This has a historical antecedent in the Old English poem Elene, in which Constantine the Great summoned an army of mounted Visigoths to his aid against the Huns
lists: Where Was Gondor When the Westfold Fell

services.title: Language Lessons
services.intro: Learn something new everyday and begin your education in the language of Rohan. generally called  simply the language of Rohan or of the Rohirrim. The adjectival form Rohirric is common

packages.title: Helm's Deep
packages.text: Visit this great hold of the Riddermark, also known as Hornburg. Helm's Deep is a great feat of engineering, except for that one drainage grate near the bottom. In all of the years it has stood it has never been broken except that one time. Visit Helm's Deep and know that you are safe behind its wall. And even if you are not, Gandalf will come on the fifth day.

packages.title: The Stables
packages.text: One cannot visit Rohan without also visiting the stables. Come brush the mane of the great horse king Shadowfax, that is, if Gandalf has not already taken him.

packages.title: The Throne Room
packages.text: Stay in the King Theoden's great Throne Room, a beautiful hall full of tapestries and the like. Watch out for a grimy little man at the foot of the throne. Eagerly await the arrival of the fractured Fellowship and a wonderful display of the White Wizard's power.

packages.title: War of the Wargs
packages.text: Take a lovely ride with Aragorn, Legolas and the people of Rohan on the road to Helm's Deep. Endure an ambush of Wargs and fight for life. Participants are advised to stay far away from the ledges of cliffs unless they have unusally faithful steads.

packages.title: Eomer's Trek
packages.text: Accomapny Eomer as he is banished from the only home he has every known and sets out to begin his life in exile. Ride with the other faithfuls and take on orc hordes.

packages.title: Barrowfield of the King's of Rohan
packages.text: Visit the Barrofields with King Theoden himself and listen to a lovely educational presentation about the flowers which grow over said graves and what their symbolic significance is.
